name: Ch.5BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Lute;Don't tell me you're actually still going to hold the winter festival, are you?
speak;Artur;I was selected this year to be the representative, so I want to do my best.|I cannot back out now.
speak;Lute;So... What do you need my help for, then?

speak;Artur;I need you to judge my light magic.|It needs to be good enough for the festival.|I'm think I'm going to try to make glowing snowflakes.|They should illuminate the area, and make it sparkle.|I want to make it feel very magical for the participants, you know?.
speak;Lute;I see.|Very well, I'll tell you what I think, then.
speak;Artur;Perfect! Thank you, Lute.|I appreciate your honest feedback.
speak;Lute;Your stance is all wrong.|If you're going to be casting this spell for that long, you need a stance more like this.
speak;Lute;... I suppose we'll be here a while.
speak;Lute;Ok, I think this is good enough for now...
speak;Artur;...Finally...|I think I'm about to fall over...
speak;Lute;... my apologies, Artur.|You did a good job, though! I think you hit your mark!|The winter festival... It'll be nice to have, won't it?
speak;Artur;That it will, Lute...|That it will...
alert;Lute and Artur have gotten closer!
alert;Artur gained WEXP in light magic!
